field.name: summary
field.value: The security context token is expired or is not valid

field.name: description
field.value:
Is any body familiar with this error?
System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageSecurityException: An unsecured or incorrectly secured fault was received from the other party. See the inner FaultException for the fault code and detail. ---> System.ServiceModel.FaultException: The security context token is expired or is not valid. The message was not processed. --- End of inner exception stack trace --- at Castle.Facilities.WcfIntegration.Proxy.WcfRemotingInterceptor.<>c__DisplayClass1.<PerformInvocation>b__0() at Castle.Facilities.WcfIntegration.ChannelReconnectPolicy.Perform(IWcfChannelHolder channelHolder, MethodInfo method, Action action) at Castle.Facilities.WcfIntegration.Proxy.WcfRemotingInterceptor.ApplyActionPolicy(IWcfChannelHolder channelHolder, IInvocation invocation, Action action) at Castle.Facilities.WcfIntegration.Proxy.WcfRemotingInterceptor.PerformInvocation(IInvocation invocation, IWcfChannelHolder channelHolder) at Castle.Facilities.WcfIntegration.Async.WcfRemotingAsyncInterceptor.PerformInvocation(IInvocation invocation, IWcfChannelHolder channelHolder) at Castle.Facilities.WcfIntegration.Proxy.WcfRemotingInterceptor.Intercept(IInvocation invocation) at Castle.DynamicProxy.AbstractInvocation.Proceed() at Castle.Proxies.IWcfChannelHolderProxy7b6c6579f7c04a02842e0dd736ad91d0.IRsvpService.GetUserRoleWithModuleType(Int32 userId, String moduleType) at Afc.Ffga.Admin403bImport.UI.GlobalApplication.GetRoles(String loginType, String userId, String moduleType) in C:\Development\vs2008web\Admin403b_10202009_t\Afc.Ffga.Admin403bImport.UI\Global.asax.cs:line 145

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: This is an issue tracker. If you have questions please use our users mailing list (http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-users). Thanks.

comment.author: henry
